00023 #define IPPROTO_ARP 1544
00024 #define IPPROTO_RARP 13696

00026 /*usual application protocoles*/
00027 #define  HTTP 1
00028 #define  FTP  2
00029 #define  SSH  3

00031 #define  POP3 5

00037 #define  PROTOCOLES_NUM 9
00038 /* a tab to strore usual protocoles stats*/

00040 
00041 
00042 /* default snap length (maximum bytes per packet to capture) */
00043 #define SNAP_LEN 1518
00044 
00045 /* ethernet headers are always exactly 14 bytes [1] */
00046 #define SIZE_ETHERNET 14
00047 
00048 /* Ethernet addresses are 6 bytes */
00049 #define ETHER_ADDR_LEN  6
00050 
00051 /* Ethernet header */
00052 struct sniff_ethernet {
00053         u_char  ether_dhost[ETHER_ADDR_LEN];    /* destination host address */
00054         u_char  ether_shost[ETHER_ADDR_LEN];    /* source host address */
00055         u_short ether_type;                     /* IP? ARP? RARP? etc */
00056 };
00057 
00058 /* IP header */
00059 struct sniff_ip {
00060         u_char  ip_vhl;                 /* version << 4 | header length >> 2 */
00061         u_char  ip_tos;                 /* type of service */
00062         u_short ip_len;                 /* total length */
00063         u_short ip_id;                  /* identification */
00064         u_short ip_off;                 /* fragment offset field */
00065         #define IP_RF 0x8000            /* reserved fragment flag */
00066         #define IP_DF 0x4000            /* dont fragment flag */
00067         #define IP_MF 0x2000            /* more fragments flag */
00068         #define IP_OFFMASK 0x1fff       /* mask for fragmenting bits */
00069         u_char  ip_ttl;                 /* time to live */
00070         u_char  ip_p;                   /* protocol */
00071         u_short ip_sum;                 /* checksum */
00072         struct  in_addr ip_src,ip_dst;  /* source and dest address */
00073 };
00074 #define IP_HL(ip)               (((ip)->ip_vhl) & 0x0f)
00075 #define IP_V(ip)                (((ip)->ip_vhl) >> 4)
00076 
00077 /* TCP header */
00078 typedef u_int tcp_seq;
00079 
00080 struct sniff_tcp {
00081         u_short th_sport;               /* source port */
00082         u_short th_dport;               /* destination port */
00083         tcp_seq th_seq;                 /* sequence number */
00084         tcp_seq th_ack;                 /* acknowledgement number */
00085         u_char  th_offx2;               /* data offset, rsvd */
00086 #define TH_OFF(th)      (((th)->th_offx2 & 0xf0) >> 4)
00087         u_char  th_flags;
00088         #define TH_FIN  0x01
00089         #define TH_SYN  0x02
00090         #define TH_RST  0x04
00091         #define TH_PUSH 0x08
00092         #define TH_ACK  0x10
00093         #define TH_URG  0x20
00094         #define TH_ECE  0x40
00095         #define TH_CWR  0x80
00096         #define TH_FLAGS        (TH_FIN|TH_SYN|TH_RST|TH_ACK|TH_URG|TH_ECE|TH_CWR)
00097         u_short th_win;                 /* window */
00098         u_short th_sum;                 /* checksum */
00099         u_short th_urp;                 /* urgent pointer */
00100 };
00101

00104 struct sniff_udp{
00105   u_short uh_sport;
00106   u_short uh_dport;
00107   u_short uh_len;
00108   u_short uh_sum;
00109 
00110 
00111 };
00112 /*icmp header */
00113 struct sniff_icmp{
00114   u_char itype;
00115   u_char icode;
00116   u_short icontr;
00117   
00118 };
00119 
00120 #define ICMP_UNREACH            3               /* dest unreachable, codes: */
00121 #define ICMP_SOURCEQUENCH       4               /* packet lost, slow down */
00122 #define ICMP_ECHO               8               /* echo service */
00123 #define ICMP_TIMXCEED           11              /* time exceeded, code: */
00124 #define ICMP_TSTAMP             13              /* timestamp request */
